title: Typeface?
content:
Does anyone know what the sentence "Turn your kids into" is set in? Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804122139/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_2.gif) | 113.26 KB |
author: iamjacobrussell

comments.content:
"Turn your kids into" is set in [Quayside](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804122139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/quayside)  
(and "VEGGIE LOVERS" in [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804122139/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garage-gothic)).
